name: Inspection in Sector 723
description:
2 player cooperative game where you need to work together to deceive the mighty Inspector and maintain the freedom in Sector 723!

My submission to Gamedev.js Jam 2021

Credits and Tools:
Framework: Phaser 3
Code: Home made spaghetti code
Graphics: Hand painted using Piksel and Leopold's Dreams color palette from lospec.com
Sound: All by myself using Reaper and TAL-NoiseMaker plugin
